character.name: Ilya Straylight
character.background: Former Custodial scout aligning fractured relay maps between the Prismwell Kite Guild and Tempered Accord envoys.

location.atmosphere: Crystalline fog hums around the interface pylons while seized wards flare across the basin.

changeFeed.reason: Echo Ledger Conclave allegedly invoked the Temporal Retcon Protocol.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Tempered Accord Custodial Council seized the Sable Crescent Basin from the Echo Ledger Conclave with coordinated prism-fire assaults.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Echo Ledger Conclave lost the basin foothold and retreated toward the Auric Steppe Corridor to regroup.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Prismwell Kite Guild stabilised the Kyther Range Vault, raising relay wards that echo through the Auric Step Prism Spire.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Echo Ledger Conclave allegedly enacted the Temporal Retcon Protocol to rewrite the siege, though the council contests the timeline.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Spectrum Bloom Flux Array resonated dangerously across the Auric Steppe Corridor, prompting emergency audits.

transcript.speaker: gm
transcript.text: Auric Step Prism Spire remains under serious threat until the Accord certifies the wardens and reverse the flux damage.
